text: Beaudricourt is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de- France region in northern France. ==Geography== A small farming village located 18 miles (28 km) west of Arras on the D23 road. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church, dating from the nineteenth century. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Beaudricourt
